dominio.pcap
Class OfflineSaveRawPacketHandler

java.lang.Object
  dominio.pcap.OfflineSaveRawPacketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sourceforge.jpcap.capture.RawPacketListener
public class OfflineSaveRawPacketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sourceforge.jpcap.capture.RawPacketListener

Handler que recoge los paquetes ne modo offline y los almacena en el fichero .

Version:
2.0
Author:
Leonardo García & JoseRamón Gutierrez
See Also:
RawPacketListener, TcpdumpWriter
